snippet: It was not quite planned this way, but the biggest star of the 4th Arts Biennale in Marrakesh may turn out to be an unfinished opera house, the town's great white elephant. Conceived in Pan-Arabic style and started 20 years ago, it was never finished...
abstract: It was not quite planned this way, but the biggest star of the 4th Arts Biennale in Marrakesh may turn out to be an unfinished opera house, the town's great white elephant. Conceived in Pan-Arabic style and started 20 years ago, it was never finished and grandly squats outside the city ramparts, part mosque, part decaying Luxor temple. It became a major site for this week's art fest because a new culture minister had nixed the use of the elegant El Badi palace. The consensus is that he did modern art a mega favor.

headline.main: Marrakesh's White Elephant Becomes an Art Star
